name: Train mania: Railroad crossing
description:
Become the boss of railroad crossing and avoid fatal car crash with train on the railway!

Start controlling railroad crossing with Train mania simulator. This game is perfect for all boys and girls and fans of trains, railroads and train stations. If you like train driving games and traffic controlling games this is the game for you. With the awesome train in this train driving simulator you will have lots of fun. Even only watching it is a lot of fun! But pay attention, railroad crossing is dangerous place and collision with train can happen any time. And you don't want to destroy your new sport car or jeep.

Main Features of Train mania: Railroad crossing
- More than 30 different cars - sport cars, vans, jeep, ambulance, trucks
- More than 20 different trains - locomotives, diesel machines, steam machines, modern electric trains
- Nice and popular 3D graphics
- Railroad crossing simulator is full of educational elements and cognitive training
- Control the railroad traffic and close the crossing gates of railway
- Stop the sports car, trucks, jeep or vans and avoid the collision with diesel, steam or electric train on the railway!
